level.text: IN GENERAL. -- There are authorized to be appropriated $60,000,000 for fiscal year 2012 and for each of the 4 succeeding fiscal years, of which--
one-third shall be made available to carry out the opportunity scholarship program under this division for each fiscal year;
one-third shall be made available to carry out section 3004(b)(1) for each fiscal year; and
one-third shall be made available to carry out section 3004(b)(2) for each fiscal year.

APPORTIONMENT. -- If the total amount of funds appropriated under subsection (a) for a fiscal year does not equal $60,000,000, the funds shall be apportioned in the manner described in subsection (a) for such fiscal year.
